DataElement.preferredName: Family History Other Cancer Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to capture the type of cancer of a family member that is not already mentioned or specified in a list of values.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to family factors or history of cancer occurence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives.  A patients family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A Conceptual Domain to capture value meanings specfic to SPOREs not suitable for placement elsewhere.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Changed name to match Context per Hvroje Med.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/22/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. Modified for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg (JP) 12/2010.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Mesothelioma form per request by T.Lichtenberg. mc 7/22/13
